definition: to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: We were kept on tenterhooks for hours while the judges chose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐立不安了好几个小时，等着裁判们决定获胜者。

sentences.english: Mr Green has been out of work for several months and is on his uppers.
sentences.chinese: 格林先生失业好几个月了，现在已过得山穷水尽。

sentences.english: It rained yesterday after it had been dry for many months.
sentences.chinese: 在天旱了好几个月之后，昨天下雨了。

sentences.english: This grave matron had several sorts of practice.
sentences.chinese: 这位假正经的妇人有好几种惯做的事情。

sentences.english: Try to pacify the child, he's been crying for hours.
sentences.chinese: 快哄哄孩子，他哭了好几个钟头了。

sentences.english: It is years since I enjoyed myself so much.
sentences.chinese: 我好几年没玩得这样痛快了。

sentences.english: FROST】Frost has killed several of our young plants.
sentences.chinese: 霜已搞坏了我们好几株幼苗。

sentences.english: Ali was the cock of the walk for many years in boxing circles .
sentences.chinese: 阿里在拳击圈里当了好几年的头号人物。

sentences.english: For centuries, Chinese wealth and power dwarfed the West’s.
sentences.chinese: 在好几个世纪里，中国的财富和权势傲视西方。

sentences.english: There are several vacant plots available for building on in the area.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区还有好几块空地皮可以用来造房子。

sentences.english: He went deep several times in the final game.
sentences.chinese: 在比赛最后的时候，他打了好几支全垒打。

sentences.english: They dickered for hours over some of the details of the agreement.
sentences.chinese: 他们就协议的某些细节讨价还价了好几钟头。

sentences.english: Several methods are taken in US universities to stop students' plagiarizing on line.
sentences.chinese: 美国大学采取好几种方法来阻止学生在网络上面抄袭。

sentences.english: Uncle Sam entertains/amuses the children for hours at a time.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆叔叔一连好几小时地逗孩子们乐。

sentences.english: This dictionary has been put together by several persons.
sentences.chinese: 这部词典是由好几个人合编成的。

sentences.english: Work on bioartificial liver devices has been under way for several years.
sentences.chinese: 生物人工肝装置的研究工作已经进行了好几年。

definition: more than ten/a dozen or more
a good deal of/quite a lot
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
a while/a spell/a short time/a burst
half of the day/a long time/quite a while/midair/CL:個|个[ge4]
